name: 15% - Deepsea Welding
description:
USE HEADPHONES FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!

The death rate of undersea welders is 15%.
Is a paycheck worth the risk?

You are sent hundreds of miles below sea to "repair" some important piping. Though, you may have limited oxygen, you may have just enough time. Stay vigilant, worker. You're alone...?

WARNING: Flashing lights, loud noises.

All assets were made by me, sounds taken from Freesound.org and edited.

This was made in 2 days.

------------------------------------------------

Controls

RMB (Hold) - Weld

WASD - Move
